resources.title: fast.ai - Practical Deep Learning for Coders
resources.description: Hands-on deep learning course that gets you building models from day one. Focuses on practical applications using PyTorch.

resources.title: Andrew Ng's Machine Learning Specialization
resources.description: The gold standard ML course by Andrew Ng. Covers supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and best practices.

resources.title: CS229 - Machine Learning (Stanford)
resources.description: Stanford's rigorous ML course covering the mathematical foundations of machine learning algorithms.

resources.title: Deep Learning Specialization
resources.description: Five-course specialization covering neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and structuring ML projects.

resources.title: CS50's Introduction to AI with Python
resources.description: Harvard's intro AI course covering search, knowledge, uncertainty, optimization, learning, and NLP.

resources.title: Full Stack Deep Learning
resources.description: Learn to build production ML systems. Covers MLOps, deployment, testing, and team workflows.

resources.title: Hugging Face NLP Course
resources.description: Practical NLP course using the Transformers library. Build and fine-tune language models.

resources.title: DataCamp AI & ML Tracks
resources.description: Interactive, browser-based courses on ML and AI with hands-on exercises and projects.

resources.title: Google Machine Learning Crash Course
resources.description: Google's fast-paced ML course with video lectures, real-world case studies, and hands-on exercises.

resources.title: PyTorch Tutorials
resources.description: Official PyTorch tutorials covering everything from basics to advanced topics like GANs and RL.

resources.title: TensorFlow Tutorials
resources.description: Step-by-step TensorFlow tutorials for beginners and experts. Includes Colab notebooks.

resources.title: LangChain Documentation & Tutorials
resources.description: Build LLM-powered applications with chains, agents, and retrieval. The leading LLM framework.

resources.title: Prompt Engineering Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to prompt engineering techniques, from basics to advanced methods like chain-of-thought.

resources.title: Anthropic's Claude Documentation
resources.description: Official docs for building with Claude API. Covers prompting, tool use, and best practices.

resources.title: Dive into Deep Learning (d2l.ai)
resources.description: Interactive deep learning textbook with code, math, and discussions. Used in courses at 500+ universities.

resources.title: Hands-On Machine Learning (O'Reilly)
resources.description: Practical ML guide using Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow. The most popular ML book.

resources.title: The Hundred-Page Machine Learning Book
resources.description: Concise yet comprehensive ML book. Read-first-buy-later model. Great for quick reference.

resources.title: Deep Learning (Goodfellow et al.)
resources.description: The definitive deep learning textbook covering mathematical foundations, modern techniques, and research frontiers.

resources.title: Speech and Language Processing (Jurafsky & Martin)
resources.description: Comprehensive NLP textbook covering classical and neural approaches to language processing.

resources.title: Google Colab
resources.description: Free Jupyter notebooks in the cloud with GPU access. No setup required.

resources.title: Hugging Face Hub
resources.description: The GitHub of ML. Host models, datasets, and Spaces. Access 500k+ pretrained models.

resources.title: Weights & Biases
resources.description: ML experiment tracking, dataset versioning, and model management. Industry standard for MLOps.

resources.title: Kaggle
resources.description: ML competitions, datasets, notebooks, and free GPU. Great for learning through practice.

resources.title: Replicate
resources.description: Run open-source ML models via API. Easy deployment without managing infrastructure.

resources.title: OpenAI API Platform
resources.description: Access GPT-4, DALL-E, Whisper and more via API. Includes playground for experimentation.

resources.title: r/MachineLearning
resources.description: The largest ML community on Reddit. Research discussions, industry news, and Q&A.

resources.title: Hugging Face Discord
resources.description: Active community of ML practitioners. Get help with models, share projects, and stay updated.

resources.title: MLOps Community
resources.description: Community focused on production ML. Slack group, meetups, and resources for deploying models.

resources.title: Papers With Code
resources.description: Track ML papers with their code implementations. Leaderboards, methods, and datasets.

resources.title: The Batch (deeplearning.ai)
resources.description: Weekly AI newsletter by Andrew Ng. Curated news, research highlights, and practical insights.

resources.title: Import AI
resources.description: Weekly AI newsletter by Jack Clark (co-founder of Anthropic). Policy, research, and industry analysis.

resources.title: AI Tidbits
resources.description: Curated weekly digest of the most important AI developments, papers, and tools.

resources.title: Lil'Log (Lilian Weng)
resources.description: In-depth technical blog posts on ML topics by OpenAI's Head of Safety Systems. Exceptional quality.

resources.title: Ahead of AI (Sebastian Raschka)
resources.description: Monthly research summaries and practical ML insights from a leading ML educator and researcher.
